Type.Name: ExpandCollapseCursorRowHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ExpandCollapseCursorRowHandler(object o, ExpandCollapseCursorRowArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ExpandCollapseCursorRowHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ExpandCollapseCursorRowHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ExpandCollapseCursorRowHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ExpandCollapseCursorRowHandler is removed from the event.
